long_description: The Lole Adore 3/4-sleeve shirt calls to mind the classic baseball T-shirt, but the feminine details of a scooped Henley neckline and off-the-shoulder seaming make it all yours. Stretchy organic cotton blend feels incredibly soft and hugs just enough to flatter and give shape. Henley neckline with raw edge binding offers an athletic-inspired yet casual look. Lole Adore 3/4-Sleeve shirt uses integrated UPF 50+ sun protection to continuously guard against harmful UV rays so you can play outside longer.
short_description: The Lole Adore 3/4-sleeve shirt calls to mind the classic baseball T-shirt, but the feminine details of a scooped Henley neckline and off-the-shoulder seaming make it all yours.
